title: FS/FT: N28 Buffalo Bill Cody - SGC 70
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS/FT: N28 Buffalo Bill Cody - SGC 70
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell or trade my N28 Cody.  SGC 70 with nice centering and color and a clean back.  $475 dlvd (OBO).  Would be willing to trade for other prewar that I need as well.  PM or email with any questions.  Thanks for looking.

Eric
